comments.body: This is the same issue as [TIMOB-28178], just a different way of reproducing it.

Problem still exists, tested with:

SDK: 9.3.0.v20201021081529
Device: Samsung Galaxy Note9 (SM-N9600)
Android Version: 10
merged to master for 9.3.0 target. Backport PR for 9_2_X required some manual adjustment, but is merged for 9.2.2 target.

Thank you very much for the very quick turnaround :)

Tested (9.3.0.v20201026143050), Works!

Verified the fix with SDK 9.3.0.v20201027120230.
Closing.
